data.title: The 3 Tech Giants That Are Driving The 2020 Stock Market
data.text: The S&P 500 bounced hard off the 3,200 resistance-level, a level we haven't seen since July, surging roughly 5% from the lows last Thursday to the 50-day moving average (3,360) this morning, which has become a new resistance level. Today we broke down off this resistance.

data.title: Microsoft (MSFT) Azure to Transform 5G Edge Cloud Computing
data.text: Microsoft (MSFT) is expected to expand presence in 5G edge cloud computing market with the introduction of Azure for Operators.

data.title: Shell (RDS.A) Unites With Microsoft to Lower Carbon Emissions
data.text: The collaboration will help Shell (RDS.A) to become a net zero-emissions company by 2050 and in Microsoft's (MSFT) allegiance to use 100% renewable power by 2025.

data.title: Worlds Inc. vs. Microsoft in Patent Infringement Lawsuit Related to “Minecraft”
data.text: Boston, MA, Sept.  29, 2020  (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) --   Worlds  Inc. (OTCQB: WDDD), a leading intellectual property developer and licensor of patents related to 3D online virtual worlds, on Sept. 25th, 2020 filed a  complaint , for patent infringement against  Microsoft  Corporation, a Washington corporation based in Redmond, Washington. In the complaint, Worlds accuses Microsoft and its “ Minecraft ” video game product of infringing Worlds' U.S. Patent No. 8,082,501, titled “System and Method for Enabling Users to Interact in a Virtual Space” (the “’501 Patent”).

data.title: Bing, smaller firms, win Google's Android search auction in Europe
data.text: Microsoft's Bing, PrivacyWall and Info.com were among the search engines that won a quarterly auction by Alphabet's Google to show up as search options on new Android devices in 31 European countries.

data.title: Video games are about to get more expensive as the console wars return
data.text: Major publishers are expected to bump up the standard price of AAA games to $70 for the new consoles.
